project_abstract.cdata: The Sixth Highway Project comprises: (a) the construction of 397 km of gravel-surfaced, all-weather roads; (b) participation in a program to procure maintenance equipment for the EHA; (c) provision of training to the EHA; (d) procurement of weighbridges for, a provision of technical assistance to the Road Transport Administration (RTA); (e) establishment of an organization to develop and maintain rural roads; and (f) extension of a subloan to an Ethiopian road contractor for the procurement of construction equipment.
